attributes.action: Create a HEALTH bank holiday on the date we finish vaccinations against Corona.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure we never forget what happened in this pandemic. To positively focus us on the huge importance of health. To give thanks and celebrate the incredible work our NHS does who went to war on our behalf.
attributes.background: Create a bank holiday dedicated to HEALTH

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Extra Bank Holiday when Covid restrictions are finally lifted
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563958

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
